public class TournamentPlayer extends TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(GameModel model, TileColor tileColor, TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.Listener listener)
      Description copied from class: TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer
      Decides the next move and reports it through TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.Listener.receiveMove(RowColPair). The execution of this method will be terminated after a specified amount of time TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.MAX_MOVE_TIME_MS, so it is important to report a move quickly, although improvements may be made as long as time is available.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in class TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer
      Parameters:
      model - the model describing the current game state
      tileColor - the color to be played
      listener - the listener to provide moves to
